description:
Mario Super Sluggers is a baseball game with a Mario twist. In the challenge mode, you'll embark on an adventure
through the Baseball Kingdom, recruit familiar characters for your team, then face Bowser and his Bowser Monsters
in a game. PLAY BALL!

sluggers-v0.0.0.description:
New year, new AP game! Mario Super Sluggers (specifically the game's Challenge Mode) is now playable as an Archipelago randomizer!

Check out the [setup guide](worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases) helpful.
sluggers-v0.0.0.title: MSS AP v0.0.0

sluggers-v0.0.1.description:
Small bugfix release, with 1 new (previously missing) check
- Added check for missing barrel in Mario Stadium
- Fixed Toadsworth behavior to prevent softlocks in certain situations
- Fixed behavior of Petey Piranha's pot before recruiting Peach
- Fixed King Boo behavior to properly check both Boo and Mini Boo have been obtained
- Fixed a bug where Waluigi could appear in Boo's location
- More failsafes to prevent impossible missions

Check out the [setup guide](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers-v0.0.1/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases) helpful.
sluggers-v0.0.1.title: MSS AP v0.0.1

sluggers-v0.0.2.description:
Another bugfix release, targeting some softlocks/crashes
- Fixed King Boo logic to avoid a potential softlock accidentally introduced in v0.0.1
- Added failsafe for missions that require certain numbers of characters unlocked to prevent a soft crash situation
sluggers-v0.0.2.title: MSS AP v0.0.2

sluggers-v0.0.3.description:
- When activated, the mission failsafe will now randomly select from a short list of safe missions rather than always selecting "throw a charge pitch"
- Added failsafe for missions that require chemistry if no suitable pairs are unlocked
- Guarantee the vanilla location for Baby Daisy's Rattle remains accessible after recruiting Baby Daisy
sluggers-v0.0.3.title: MSS AP v0.0.3

sluggers-v0.0.4r2.description: - Fix bug with chemistry mission failsafe
sluggers-v0.0.4r2.title: MSS AP v0.0.4

sluggers-v0.1.0.description:
- New option: Goal Condition
  - Defeat Bowser Monsters: Unlock a full team and the day-night cycle, then defeat the Bowser Monsters in a game.
  - Play Badge: Unlock and win all minigames (including Toy Field).
- New option: Randomize Shops

Check out the [setup guide](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases) helpful.
sluggers-v0.1.0.title: MSS AP v0.1.0

sluggers-v0.1.1.description:
- The 3 unique items to the secret shop will now be included in the randomization when Randomize Shops is set to full.
- New option: Randomize Music

Check out the [setup guide](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases) helpful.
sluggers-v0.1.1.title: MSS AP v0.1.1

sluggers-v0.1.2.description:
- Allow client to connect gracefully when music randomization is off or APWorld version is outdated

Check out the [setup guide](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases) helpful.
sluggers-v0.1.2.title: MSS AP v0.1.2

sluggers-v0.2.0.description:
- New options for Goal Condition
  - Friend Badge: Recruit all characters.
  - Star Badge: Have star status on every character and defeat the Bowser Monsters in a game.
- New option: Randomize Stars
- The roster of the Bowser Monsters is now in the pool when the goal condition is not Defeat Bowser Monsters.
- Fixed a bug where beginning a full game could error or crash when random music was enabled.
- Improved mission fallback handling
  - Every mission should now be accounted for so there should never be a softlock/crash from an invalid mission.
  - The list of "safe" missions that may be used as replacements has been expanded.

Check out the [setup guide](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases) helpful.
sluggers-v0.2.0.title: MSS AP v0.2.0

sluggers-v0.2.1.description:
- Fixed a bug where the Cruiser Pass location would be inaccessible if the pass had previously been received.
- Fixed a potential error/crash after the opening cutscene when random music was enabled.

Check out the [setup guide](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md>) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases>) helpful.
sluggers-v0.2.1.title: MSS AP v0.2.1

sluggers-v0.2.2.description:
- Mission failsafes now properly apply when the character you are opposing would otherwise be required to complete the mission.
- Updated documentation.

Check out the [setup guide](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md>) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases>) helpful.
sluggers-v0.2.2.title: MSS AP v0.2.2

sluggers-v0.2.3.description:
- Mission failsafes now apply for batting/running missions where the game requires the catcher to be a captain.

Check out the [setup guide](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md>) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases>) helpful.
sluggers-v0.2.3.title: MSS AP v0.2.3
